meanings.definition: A railroad car with a flat platform and no sides or roof, used for transporting goods or vehicles.
meanings.sent1: The flatcars carried new cars from the factory to the dealership.
meanings.sent2: The train consisted of several flatcars loaded with lumber.
meanings.sent3: The flatcars decided to have a race to see who could transport the most goods in a day.
meanings.sent4: The flatcars lined up on the tracks like obedient soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The image of the flatcars rolling along the railway was etched in his memory.
